```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
x <- read_csv("data/social_capital_county.csv", show_col_types =  FALSE) |>
  drop_na() |>
  select(county_name, pop2018, ec_county)

```

```{r}
x |>
  mutate(state = str_replace(county_name, ".*, ", "")) |>
  summarize(pop = sum(pop2018), .by = state, na.rm = FALSE, 
            avg_ec = mean(ec_country), 
            .by = state) |>
  ggplot(mapping = aes(x = pop, y = avg_ec)) +
  geom_point() + goem_smooth(method = "lm") +
  scales_x_log10(labels = scales::comma_format())  +
  labs()
```
